title: Help please Ive tried everything i can think of
body: I cant get league to start up. I start the launcher click the start button at the top and it spits out an error message..... The application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000005). Click OK to close the application........ I'm not sure what else to try. I've run as admin, run the repair tool, downloaded hextech repair tool and run that, tried running compatibility troubleshooter, uninstalled and reinstalled, even factory reset my cup and tried all of these over again. the application doesn't even get far enough for me to log in. I just don't know what else to try

replies.body: Most of the time that type of error means your OS is blocking League from launching, possibly due to incorrect permission settings, but it sounds like you've already taken most of the steps that should be able to fix it. Just in case, double check the steps in this [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to check for anything you might have missed, and if that still doesn't help reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for a few more in depth troubleshooting steps.
